attributes.action: force all rail companies to make allowances on all routes and trains for bycicle users
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All rail companies should allow all commuters on all routes and at all times to carry and transport cycles and bycicles on their journeys. The main aim of this is to help commuters achieve more environmentally and eco friendly journeys to and from work or any other destination. This in turn would contribute substantially to achieving less pollution and energy consumption which in turn would contribute less to eco and environmental impact of pollution.
